title: Her Insatiable Addiction
description: Yvette Rivers, girlfriend of Detective Kevin O'Neal, after a traumatic kidnapping is now struggling to save her relationship with Kevin which is slowly falling apart at the seams because of her fixation with her kidnapper, Morris Gardner. Kevin believes his relationship is worth fighting for but finds himself being pulled into another world, one that involves the beautiful single-parent mother, Ava Ruthers. Things once again, take a deadly turn as both Yvette and Kevin begin to think it might be too late to save their dysfunctional relationship but are unable to shake their fatal attraction to each other.
author: C.C.  Miller
